meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an apple.
meanings.sent1: The appley scent of the candle filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The appley tree in the garden bore delicious fruits.
meanings.sent3: She wore an appley perfume that made everyone crave apple pie.
meanings.sent4: The appley sunset painted the sky in shades of red and gold.
meanings.sent5: The appley taste of the pie lingered on her tongue long after she finished eating.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or smell of apples.
meanings.sent1: The appley cider was refreshing on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The appley aroma of the pie baking in the oven made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent3: He sprayed an appley air freshener in the room, making it feel like an orchard.
meanings.sent4: The appley sweetness of the dessert danced on her taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The appley fragrance of the shampoo reminded her of picking apples in the orchard.
